quote: No man was ever wise by chance.
name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: Growth is never by mere chance; it is the result of forces working together.
name: James Cash Penney

quote: Forgiveness says you are given another chance to make a new beginning.
name: Desmond Tutu

quote: To reminisce with my old friends, a chance to share some memories, and play our songs again.
name: Ricky Nelson

quote: Learning is not attained by chance, it must be sought for with ardor and diligence.
name: Abigail Adams

quote: Tea time is a chance to slow down, pull back and appreciate our surroundings.
name: Letitia Baldrige

quote: Cheers to a new year and another chance for us to get it right.
name: Oprah Winfrey

quote: I don't want to miss out on the chance of having a good time.
name: Victor Webster

quote: Freedom is nothing but a chance to be better.
name: Albert Camus

quote: Every year on your birthday, you get a chance to start new.
name: Sammy Hagar

quote: The risk of a wrong decision is preferable to the terror of indecision.
name: Maimonides

quote: There are risks and costs to action. But they are far less than the long range risks of comfortable inaction.
name: John F. Kennedy

quote: My smile will always be broken, but I'll always be grateful for the chance to get to do what I get to do.
name: Trent Franks

quote: When I have a chance to go back to my village, I always remind myself where I came from.
name: Mohamed Salah

quote: Far and away the best prize that life has to offer is the chance to work hard at work worth doing.
name: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Living at risk is jumping off the cliff and building your wings on the way down.
name: Ray Bradbury

quote: A lie gets halfway around the world before the truth has a chance to get its pants on.
name: Winston Churchill

quote: A problem is a chance for you to do your best.
name: Duke Ellington

quote: I will prepare and some day my chance will come.
name: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Just keep taking chances and having fun.
name: Garth Brooks

quote: Enjoy your sweat because hard work doesn't guarantee success, but without it you don't have a chance.
name: Alex Rodriguez

quote: If you take no risks, you will suffer no defeats. But if you take no risks, you win no victories.
name: Richard M. Nixon

quote: Beware of missing chances; otherwise it may be altogether too late some day.
name: Franz Liszt

quote: If you are not willing to risk the unusual, you will have to settle for the ordinary.
name: Jim Rohn

quote: Be glad of life because it gives you the chance to love, to work, to play, and to look up at the stars.
name: Henry Van Dyke

quote: I've got big shoes to fill. This is my chance to do something. I have to seize the moment.
name: Andrew Jackson

quote: If you do not believe you can do it then you have no chance at all.
name: Arsene Wenger

quote: If you don't take the chance to live life, what can you say at the end of it?
name: Naveen Andrews

quote: Take calculated risks. That is quite different from being rash.
name: George S. Patton

quote: Persistence and resilience only come from having been given the chance to work though difficult problems.
name: Gever Tulley

quote: Filmmaking is a chance to live many lifetimes.
name: Robert Altman

quote: If somebody is gracious enough to give me a second chance, I won't need a third.
name: Pete Rose

quote: First, I have to thank God for giving me the gift that he did as well as a second chance for a better life.
name: Oksana Baiul

quote: Buy the ticket, take the ride.
name: Hunter S. Thompson

quote: I think we consider too much the good luck of the early bird and not enough the bad luck of the early worm.
name: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: If you turn a smiling face on the world, you've got a chance of finishing up a good-looking old person.
name: Rolf Harris

quote: Random chance plays a huge part in everybody's life.
name: Gary Gygax

quote: Every existing thing is born without reason, prolongs itself out of weakness, and dies by chance.
name: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: Chance is a word void of sense; nothing can exist without a cause.
name: Voltaire

quote: We all have big changes in our lives that are more or less a second chance.
name: Harrison Ford

quote: I never quit trying. I never felt that I didn't have a chance to win.
name: Arnold Palmer

quote: Luck marches with those who give their very best.
name: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: Care and diligence bring luck.
name: Thomas Fuller

quote: It's true hard work never killed anybody, but I figure, why take the chance?
name: Ronald Reagan

quote: Chance has never yet satisfied the hope of a suffering people.
name: Marcus Garvey

quote: Having a second chance makes you want to work even harder.
name: Tia Mowry

quote: It's choice - not chance - that determines your destiny.
name: Jean Nidetch

quote: My whole story is just about me having a second chance.
name: Two Chainz

quote: Always go to the bathroom when you have a chance.
name: King George V

quote: As for Guns N' Roses, I don't think there's ever a chance of a reunion.
name: Slash

quote: The only safe thing is to take a chance.
name: Mike Nichols

quote: Housework can't kill you, but why take a chance?
name: Phyllis Diller

quote: It seems to be a law of nature, inflexible and inexorable, that those who will not risk cannot win.
name: John Paul Jones

quote: We are not trying to entertain the critics. I'll take my chances with the public.
name: Walt Disney

quote: When men and women are able to respect and accept their differences then love has a chance to blossom.
name: John Gray

quote: Do you want to be safe and good, or do you want to take a chance and be great?
name: Jimmy Johnson

quote: When I'm ready to fight, my opponent has a better chance of surviving a forest fire wearing gasoline drawers.
name: Mr. T

quote: All we are saying is give peace a chance.
name: John Lennon

quote: Luck is not chance, it's toil; fortune's expensive smile is earned.
name: Emily Dickinson

quote: Everything existing in the universe is the fruit of chance and necessity.
name: Democritus

quote: Since there is nothing so well worth having as friends, never lose a chance to make them.
name: Francesco Guicciardini

quote: A consistent soul believes in destiny, a capricious one in chance.
name: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Good governance, safety, a chance to grow economically and professionally - those are important things.
name: Dana Perino

quote: Taking risks gives me energy.
name: Jay Chiat

quote: It's so much worse to live in regret in your forties than it is to take a chance in your late twenties.
name: Donna Lynne Champlin

quote: Supporting the entrepreneurial spirit is our best chance for economic progress.
name: Scott Peters

quote: Give yourself a chance to see how much better life will get. And it will get better.
name: Joel Burns

quote: If I had a chance for another life, I would certainly choose a better complexion.
name: Richard Burton

quote: Grab a chance and you won't be sorry for a might-have-been.
name: Arthur Ransome

quote: The flower has opened, has been in the sun and is unafraid. I'm taking more chances; I'm bold and proud.
name: Paula Cole

quote: All discarded lovers should be given a second chance, but with somebody else.
name: Mae West

quote: I mean we all need a second chance sometimes.
name: Joel Osteen

quote: Problems can be experienced as... a chance for renewal rather than stress.
name: Marilyn Ferguson

quote: If no one ever took risks, Michaelangelo would have painted the Sistine floor.
name: Neil Simon

quote: I love being an anchor, as it gives you a chance to be yourself.
name: Rithvik Dhanjani

quote: Good luck has its storms.
name: George Lucas

quote: I postpone death by living, by suffering, by error, by risking, by giving, by losing.
name: Anais Nin

quote: You never say never. There's always a chance to do things in the future.
name: Nick Cummins

quote: When I get the chance to make my favorite breakfast on the weekend, I often choose to make pancakes.
name: Marcus Samuelsson

quote: Treat all men alike. Give them the same law. Give them an even chance to live and grow.
name: Chief Joseph

quote: Not every father gets a chance to start his son off in his own footsteps.
name: Alan Ladd

quote: Don't ever try and be like anybody else and don't be afraid to take risks.
name: Waylon Jennings

quote: I eat at In-N-Out Burger every chance I get.
name: Robin Wright

quote: My father will anticipate everything. He will leave you and me no chance to do a great and brilliant deed.
name: Alexander the Great

quote: I prefer to be alive, so I'm cautious about taking risks.
name: Werner Herzog

quote: A poem gives me a chance to have an encounter with a feeling, with an experience, with a wish, with an idea.
name: Tracy K. Smith

quote: My calling, as one imperfect human, is to celebrate and uphold life every time I get the chance.
name: Victoria Moran

quote: You only get one chance at life and you have to grab it boldly.
name: Bear Grylls

quote: Nobody owes anybody a living, but everybody is entitled to a chance.
name: Jack Dempsey

quote: One chance is all you need.
name: Jesse Owens

quote: A pound of pluck is worth a ton of luck.
name: James A. Garfield

quote: Children are our second chance to have a great parent-child relationship.
name: Laura Schlessinger

quote: It's important to give it all you have while you have the chance.
name: Shania Twain

quote: Chance The Rapper is just unreal: he's changing rap and really creating this whole amazing new style.
name: Shawn Mendes

quote: If you have a dream, give it a chance to happen.
name: Richard M. DeVos

quote: I never had a chance to play with dolls like other kids. I started working when I was six years old.
name: Billie Holiday

quote: However well organized the foundations of life may be, life must always be full of risks.
name: Havelock Ellis

quote: One of my favourite things about living in the U.K. is having that chance to go to festivals.
name: Katherine Ryan

quote: All I ask is the chance to prove that money can't make me happy.
name: Spike Milligan

quote: If there is anything that a man can do well, I say let him do it. Give him a chance.
name: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Necessity is the mother of taking chances.
name: Mark Twain

quote: When a person cannot deceive himself the chances are against his being able to deceive other people.
name: Mark Twain

quote: If you don't love the Dodgers, there's a good chance you may not get into Heaven.
name: Tommy Lasorda

quote: Read the best books first, or you may not have a chance to read them at all.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Balance provides the chance for longevity. You can be a champion at work and at home.
name: Tony Dungy

quote: I really don't like the gym. I like experiences, so I take any chance I get to go on a bicycle or on a hike.
name: Blake Lively

quote: Nothing is as obnoxious as other people's luck.
name: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quote: My belief is you have one chance to make a first impression.
name: Kevin McCarthy

quote: Going to college offered me the chance to play football for four more years.
name: Ronald Reagan

quote: Desperation is like stealing from the Mafia: you stand a good chance of attracting the wrong attention.
name: Douglas Horton

quote: Most of us regard good luck as our right, and bad luck as a betrayal of that right.
name: William Feather

quote: It is not like I have gone crazy, I just don't want to take any chances. You never know what could happen.
name: Ruth Bader Ginsburg

quote: Everybody deserves a second chance in this world. That's basically all I ask.
name: Shannen Doherty

quote: When it comes to luck, you make your own.
name: Bruce Springsteen

quote: Happiness in marriage is entirely a matter of chance.
name: Jane Austen

quote: The history of free men is never really written by chance but by choice; their choice!
name: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quote: Hateful words stand no chance against self-worth and a little of humor.
name: Iskra Lawrence

quote: Work for something because it is good, not just because it stands a chance to succeed.
name: Vaclav Havel

quote: You know, from my point of view, I'm the luckiest cat on the planet.
name: Hugh Hefner

quote: Good luck is a residue of preparation.
name: Jack Youngblood

quote: You can't just dream about what you want and leave things to chance. You have to get it yourself.
name: Irina Shayk

quote: I think we have a good chance of surviving long enough to colonize the solar system.
name: Stephen Hawking

quote: Hold puppies, kittens, and babies anytime you get the chance.
name: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: The right time is any time that one is still so lucky as to have.
name: Henry James

quote: Nothing happens quite by chance. It's a question of accretion of information and experience.
name: Jonas Salk

quote: The man who is intent on making the most of his opportunities is too busy to bother about luck.
name: B. C. Forbes

quote: I believe in giving people a second chance.
name: George Zimmer

quote: Chance gives rise to thoughts, and chance removes them; no art can keep or acquire them.
name: Blaise Pascal

quote: No man ever wetted clay and then left it, as if there would be bricks by chance and fortune.
name: Plutarch

quote: All anyone asks for is a chance to work with pride.
name: W. Edwards Deming

quote: Those who trust to chance must abide by the results of chance.
name: Calvin Coolidge

quote: But we also believe in taking risks, because that's how you move things along.
name: Melinda Gates

quote: I just do whatever it is that I believe I should do, regardless of the risks to my life.
name: Corazon Aquino

quote: I want the world to know that everybody deserves a second chance.
name: El DeBarge

quote: Give ordinary folk the chance to buy the same things as rich people.
name: Sam Walton

quote: I say if you're going to take a chance on something, you just go full balls to the wall.
name: Toby Keith

quote: The thing is most people are afraid to step out, to take a chance beyond their established identity.
name: Demi Moore

quote: Harness mules and oxen, but give a horse a chance to run.
name: Wild Bill Hickok

quote: It seemed to me that this might be a great pageant, which would give a chance for a very interesting picture.
name: Henry Ossawa Tanner

quote: Refusing to ask for help when you need it is refusing someone the chance to be helpful.
name: Ric Ocasek

quote: We stand a better chance with aristocracy, whether hereditary or elective, than with monarchy.
name: Ezra Stiles

quote: I hope I will always have the chance to play the violin.
name: Joshua Bell

quote: Give peace a chance.
name: Yitzhak Rabin

quote: I was dying but suddenly had a second chance at living.
name: Shelley Fabares

quote: I figure you have the same chance of winning the lottery whether you play or not.
name: Fran Lebowitz

quote: Luck is always the last refuge of laziness and incompetence.
name: James Cash Penney

quote: If you like the stuff I do, my chances of liking you go up.
name: Penn Jillette

quote: True ease in writing comes from art, not chance, as those move easiest who have learn'd to dance.
name: Alexander Pope

quote: Those who seek to profit by division don't stand a chance.
name: Henry Rollins

quote: God's dice always have a lucky roll.
name: Sophocles

quote: I fear the boredom that comes with not learning and not taking chances.
name: Robert Fulghum

quote: 'Chance the Rapper' is many things. I'm constantly evolving.
name: Chance The Rapper

quote: Great deeds are usually wrought at great risks.
name: Herodotus

quote: The public health of five million children should not be left to luck or chance.
name: Jamie Oliver

quote: It's been a struggle for me because I had a chance to be white and refused.
name: Richard Pryor

quote: I think the harder you work, the more luck you have.
name: Dave Thomas

quote: The successful man is the one who had the chance and took it.
name: Roger Babson

quote: I had a chance to get used to the lights and the camera without all that pressure to... emote.
name: Kerri Green

quote: The whole life of an American is passed like a game of chance, a revolutionary crisis, or a battle.
name: Alexis de Tocqueville

quote: War never takes a wicked man by chance, the good man always.
name: Sophocles

quote: Chance fights ever on the side of the prudent.
name: Euripides

quote: Joint undertakings stand a better chance when they benefit both sides.
name: Euripides

quote: I like entrepreneurial people; I like people who take risks.
name: Billie Jean King

quote: Being in a ship is being in a jail, with the chance of being drowned.
name: Samuel Johnson

quote: A wise man turns chance into good fortune.
name: Thomas Fuller

quote: I don't believe in pitfalls. I believe in taking risks and not doing the same thing twice.
name: Guy Laliberte

quote: Your chances of success in any undertaking can always be measured by your belief in yourself.
name: Robert Collier

quote: Improvisation is too good to leave to chance.
name: Paul Simon

quote: From my point of view, I always want to fight until the end of my last chance.
name: Pep Guardiola

quote: I'm a great believer in giving people a chance.
name: Roger Ailes

quote: A dream will always triumph over reality, once it is given the chance.
name: Stanislaw Lem

quote: If your parents didn't have any children, there's a good chance that you won't have any.
name: Clarence Day

quote: There are such strong women in my life that there's no chance of me getting too big for my boots.
name: Jack Lowden

quote: You hit home runs not by chance but by preparation.
name: Roger Maris

quote: I was a good football player, and I had a chance to play with some great players.
name: Dwayne Johnson

quote: The people of New York took a big chance on me. And I'm well aware of that.
name: Hillary Clinton

quote: Chance is perhaps the pseudonym of God when he did not want to sign.
name: Anatole France

quote: Why talk now when so many things have been said without ever giving me a chance to talk?
name: Bobby Knight

quote: The true statesman is the one who is willing to take risks.
name: Charles de Gaulle

quote: Nowadays love is a matter of chance, matrimony a matter of money and divorce a matter of course.
name: Helen Rowland

quote: Chance explorations on search engines do not 'accidentally' lead users to extremist websites.
name: Maajid Nawaz

quote: Every child should have a chance to feel special.
name: Chuck Close

quote: When you have the chance to play a Champions League final, you have to win it.
name: Gianluigi Buffon

quote: Luck, that's when preparation and opportunity meet.
name: Pierre Trudeau

quote: Practice every time you get a chance.
name: Bill Monroe

quote: Chance makes our parents, but choice makes our friends.
name: Jacques Delille

quote: There's talent on the streets, kids with ideas who have stories to tell and never get a chance.
name: James Jannard

quote: Events are not a matter of chance.
name: Gamal Abdel Nasser

quote: I'm just really thankful to have the chance to portray a character you don't see every day.
name: Regina King

quote: The censorship is such on television in the U.S. that films like mine don't stand a chance.
name: John Pilger

quote: I just love to play and I get a chance to play with other musicians and I jump on it.
name: Chad Smith

quote: Fortune, seeing that she could not make fools wise, has made them lucky.
name: Michel de Montaigne

quote: Given a chance, I would like to work with Aishwarya Rai Bachchan because she's a versatile actor.
name: Brad Pitt

quote: Easter is very important to me, it's a second chance.
name: Reba McEntire

quote: Every business and every product has risks. You can't get around it.
name: Lee Iacocca

quote: We should read to give our souls a chance to luxuriate.
name: Henry Miller

quote: I could have easily gone down the wrong path and dropped out of school, but I was given a second chance.
name: Kevin O'Leary

quote: If the sun comes up, I have a chance.
name: Venus Williams

quote: I've always taken risks, and never worried what the world might really think of me.
name: Cher

quote: Some folk want their luck buttered.
name: Thomas Hardy

quote: Everyone has a chance to learn, improve, and build up their skills.
name: Tom Peters

quote: Poker is a skill game pretending to be a chance game.
name: James Altucher

quote: If I got a chance to play with another great player, I want to do that. I mean, the objective is to win.
name: Charles Barkley

quote: If you get a chance to play with great players, that's half the battle.
name: Charles Barkley

quote: I have a second chance on life.
name: Katy Perry

quote: The Supreme Court is having a hard time integrating schools. What chance do I have to integrate audiences?
name: Nat King Cole

quote: I actually didn't go to prom. I didn't have the chance.
name: Lili Reinhart

quote: I never miss a chance to have sex or appear on television.
name: Gore Vidal

quote: Giving children a fair chance to achieve their dreams and reach their potential is everyone's responsibility.
name: Randi Weingarten

quote: The real trouble with war (modern war) is that it gives no one a chance to kill the right people.
name: Ezra Pound

quote: For the happiest life, days should be rigorously planned, nights left open to chance.
name: Mignon McLaughlin

quote: A fool must now and then be right, by chance.
name: William Cowper

quote: I believe in luck: how else can you explain the success of those you dislike?
name: Jean Cocteau

quote: In prison, you get the chance to see who really loves you.
name: Suge Knight

quote: If you're so afraid of failure, you will never succeed. You have to take chances.
name: Mario Andretti

quote: I do not believe anything comes by chance. I regard the present as the necessary child of a necessary past.
name: Robert Green Ingersoll

quote: Chance, my dear, is the sovereign deity in child-bearing.
name: Honore de Balzac

quote: I'm only 35, and I felt that the time was right to try to come back and have a chance for him to see me play.
name: Mario Lemieux

quote: The circle of the return to birth can only remain open, but this is a chance, a sign of life, and a wound.
name: Jacques Derrida

quote: Just by luck, I picked good heroes to worship.
name: Charles Kuralt

quote: The cost of living is going up and the chance of living is going down.
name: Flip Wilson

quote: If you keep on saying things are going to be bad, you have a good chance of being a prophet.
name: Isaac Bashevis Singer

quote: In using chance operations, the mind is enriched.
name: Merce Cunningham

quote: Teachers have a chance to mold someone, inspire them. I hope all teachers realize that.
name: Kevin James

quote: If what I do prove well, it won't advance. They'll say it's stolen, or else it was by chance.
name: Anne Bradstreet

quote: If your parents never had children, chances are you won't either.
name: Dick Cavett

quote: At some point in your life, if you're lucky, you get to design the way in which things evolve.
name: Daniel Day-Lewis

quote: The first time Adam had a chance, he laid the blame on women.
name: Nancy Astor

quote: In passing, also, I would like to say that the first time Adam had a chance he laid the blame on a woman.
name: Nancy Astor

quote: I love my fans, so when I get the chance to interact with them, it's beautiful.
name: Flo Rida

quote: I believe that fate is choices - it's not chance.
name: Wayne Newton

quote: I'm a chemistry guy. I believe you've got to play together to have a chance to win.
name: Tony Gwynn

quote: Great risks come in long term, tremendously assiduous, very courageous study.
name: William Hurt

quote: Thinking of Plan B muddies up your chances of succeeding at Plan A.
name: Charlie Day

quote: It's a great experience. If you get a chance to run for president, do it.
name: Mitt Romney

quote: In Japan, usually, once you become prime minister, you do not have a second chance.
name: Shinzo Abe

quote: If one has curiosity, then one stands the chance of attain a high level of scientific inquiry.
name: Ada Yonath

quote: Luck relies on chance, labor on character.
name: Richard Cobden

quote: I grew up on the stage, and there's no two ways about it: you only get one chance to do your bit.
name: Jack Lowden

quote: Birth is violent, and out of that violence is our only chance of rebirth.
name: Nick Nolte

quote: I got a chance to work with Judi Dench in almost every scene. How many Indian actors get that chance?
name: Ali Fazal

quote: There was a period where I was a little scared that I'd blown my chance.
name: Carlene Carter

quote: Traveling in India gives you a chance to observe a renaissance.
name: Marie Brenner

quote: You never know who's going to become your friend. Friends are always chance meetings.
name: Steve Guttenberg

quote: It takes one person to give you a big chance.
name: Patricia Velasquez

quote: There's no second chance on stage, and I was trained to make the most of my first chance.
name: Kate Smith

quote: I just basically took a chance because it looked like fun and I wanted the .
name: Rob Mariano

quote: If I get a chance to dress up, I really go for it.
name: Annabelle Wallis

quote: I wanna be funny, but if I have a chance to make a point while being funny - why not?
name: Chris Cubas

quote: I'm competitive. I'd love another chance to be part of a Stanley Cup championship team. That'd be awesome.
name: Ed Belfour

quote: I'm motivated by creating a level playing field for the world so that the weak have a chance.
name: Iqbal Quadir

quote: Luck can be assisted. It is not all chance with the wise.
name: Baltasar Gracian

quote: If men are honest, everything they do and everywhere they go is for a chance to see women.
name: Jack Nicholson

quote: I'm the one who will take chances, not worry about the backlash.
name: Magic Johnson

quote: I lucked out when I started to sing. I'd already experienced failing at everything else.
name: Cyndi Lauper

quote: When a man has no reason to trust himself, he trusts in luck.
name: E. W. Howe

quote: When you talk about the SEC, you never get a chance to rest.
name: Kirby Smart

quote: The worst cynicism: a belief in luck.
name: Joyce Carol Oates

quote: I take risks - that's my life on the slopes and off.
name: Lindsey Vonn

quote: I keep my inner circle of people very small and tight, and I like to relax if I get a chance.
name: Dean Ambrose

quote: I am a great believer in luck, and I find the harder I work the more I have of it.
name: Stephen Leacock

quote: I always sort of thought, 'I'm probably going to get breast cancer. There's a really good chance.'
name: Cynthia Nixon

quote: To work all the time is to be incredibly lucky.
name: Harvey Fierstein

quote: I love taking chances.
name: Wayne Newton

quote: You might not trust me. Please give me a chance and time. I will prove myself for all of you.
name: Yingluck Shinawatra

quote: Living is risking.
name: Jeanne Moreau

quote: It's luck that one thing works out and one doesn't, it's sort of happenstance.
name: Richard Linklater

quote: If you are worried about what people think of you, you should go into politics. Real actors take chances.
name: Rob Lowe

quote: I've told myself I have a chance to make history, and that's my focus.
name: Jordan Spieth

quote: Before the first year, nobody gave it a chance. Now, 36 years later, everybody knows Monday Night Football.
name: Frank Gifford

quote: If we win trophies, we have the chance to win individual awards because it comes with the team targets.
name: Fernando Torres

quote: I know I can get laughs anywhere, in front of any crowd, if I'm given the chance.
name: Bobby Lee

quote: It's not about failure; it's about trying something and risking something for attaining your goal.
name: Carol Alt

quote: I just have to take my chances like any other composer.
name: Gordon Getty

quote: To be successful, one must take chances.
name: Willie Stargell

quote: Every fight, honest to say, in this division, at this level, is a toss-up. It's a 50-50 chance.
name: Alistair Overeem

quote: Ain't no chance if you don't take it.
name: Guy Clark

quote: This business is always changing. If you're going to be a leader, you've got to take chances.
name: Ronnie Milsap

quote: Reed Morano is an amazing woman and one of the most extraordinary people I've had the chance to work with.
name: O. T. Fagbenle

quote: Sometimes I just have a chance to go forward, so of course I try to make the most of it.
name: Julie Ertz
